taxon_name.authority: D. C. Eaton ex L. Underwood
D. C. Eaton ex L. Underwood

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family selaginellaceae;genus selaginella;subgenus tetragonostachys;species mutica;variety mutica

bio:treatment.description: Leaf apex with or without bristle, 0.03--0.06 mm; margins long-ciliate, rarely denticulate, cilia spreading. Sporophyll margins usually long-ciliate, seldom denticulate, cilia spreading.
Exposed or sheltered rocky bluffs, cliffs, ledges, on igneous, sandstone, or limestone;
Ariz., Colo., N.Mex., Utah, Tex., Wyo.
